APIListAlpha.description: Insert an alphabetical list of APIs.

APIRef.description: Create the sidebar for a referenced API.

params.apiName: The API name to reference, e.g. "DOM" or "Performance_API".

AvailableInWorkers.description: Indicate that the content or API is available in web workers.

Compat.description: Insert compatibility information or compatibility table references.

CSP.description: Insert or reference Content Security Policy header info.

params.contentSecurityPolicy: The CSP value or directive set to reference.

CSSInfo.description: Displays general information about a CSS property or descriptor.

CSSRef.description: Create the sidebar for the CSS category.

CSS_Ref.description: Inserts an index of all CSS properties, selectors, types, functions and at-rules plus their descriptors.

CSSSyntax.description: Displays the formal syntax for a CSS property.

CSSSyntaxRaw.description: Write a manual syntax of a CSS property.

params.syntax: The manual syntax to display as a syntax.

params.property: The CSS property or at-rule to reference.
params.displayText: Optional display text to show instead of the canonical name.
params.anchor: Optional anchor inside the referenced documentation.

params.apiName: Optional API name to scope the sidebar to.

Deprecated_Header.description: Display a banner to warn about deprecated content.

Deprecated_Inline.description: Inline marker indicating deprecation of the referenced item.

DOMxRef.description: Used for generating cross-references within the Web API documentation.

params.apiName: The DOM API name to reference (e.g. 'Node', 'Window.get()').
params.displayText: Optional text to display instead of the canonical API name.
params.anchor: Optional anchor/fragment inside the referenced documentation.
params.disableFormatting: Optional boolean to disable automatic formatting (true/false).

EmbedGHLiveSample.description: Embed a GitHub-based live sample (playground) in the page.

params.pathToRepoFile: Path to the sample file in the repository.
params.width: Optional width in pixels or CSS units.
params.height: Optional height in pixels or CSS units.

EmbedLiveSample.description: Embed a live sample example into the content.

params.exampleTitle: Title or identifier of the live sample.
params.width: Optional width in pixels or CSS units.
params.height: Optional height in pixels or CSS units.
params.allowed_features: Optional list of allowed features for the live sample.

EmbedYouTube.description: Embed a YouTube video with optional parameters.

ExperimentalBadge.description: A badge indicating experimental status of a parameter or feature.

Firefox_for_developers.description: This macro generates a list of links to Firefox release notes.

Glossary.description: Create a glossary reference for a term.

GlossaryDisambiguation.description: Provide a list of sub-terms for disambiguation.

HTMLSidebar.description: Render the HTML section sidebar navigation.

HTMLElement.description: Insert or reference an HTML element by name with optional localized labels and mode.

params.element: The HTML element name to reference (e.g. "summary").
params.displayText: Optional display text or localized label.
params.anchor: Optional anchor or fragment identifier inside the element.

HTTPHeader.description: Reference an HTTP header and its description.

params.header: The HTTP header name to reference.

HTTPMethod.description: Reference an HTTP method such as GET or POST.

params.method: The HTTP method name (e.g. GET, POST).

HTTPStatus.description: Reference an HTTP status code and its meaning.

params.status: The HTTP status code to reference (e.g. 404).

InheritanceDiagram.description: Insert an inheritance diagram showing relationships between classes/interfaces.

params.apiName: Optional API to center the inheritance diagram on.

InteractiveExample.description: Embed an interactive example with optional supported heights.

params.title: Title of the example.
params.supportedHeight: Optional display height mode. Allowed values: 'shorter', 'taller', 'tabbed-shorter', 'tabbed-standard', 'tabbed-taller'.

JSFiddleEmbed.description: Embed a JSFiddle snippet or example.

params.displayText: Optional display text to show instead of the canonical name.
params.anchor: Optional anchor inside the referenced documentation.

JsSidebar.description: Render the JavaScript sidebar navigation of a specific reference.

js_property_attributes.description: Generate a table of JavaScript object property's attributes.

LandingPageListSubpages.description: List subpages for a landing page, optionally with summaries.

ListGroups.description: Create grouped lists used for navigation or content lists.

ListSubpages.description: List subpages for a section or topic.

params.url: Optional base URL or path to list subpages from.
params.ordered: Optional boolean: use an ordered list (true/false).

ListSubpagesForSidebar.description: List subpages specifically formatted for the sidebar.

LiveSampleLink.description: Insert a link to a live sample example.

params.anchorId: Anchor or identifier of the live sample.
params.displayText: Optional text to display for the link.

MathMLElement.description: Reference a MathML element and optionally display a custom name.

params.tag: The MathML tag name to reference (e.g. 'mi', 'mo').

MDNSidebar.description: Render the MDN sidebar component for navigation.

Next.description: Reveal navigation to the next page or section.

params.nextPage: Optional target page or slug for the 'next' link.
Optional target page for the next link.
params.overviewPage: Optional overview page slug for context.

Non-standard_Header.description: Display a banner for non-standard features or content.

Optional_Inline.description: Inline helper for optional properties or arguments.

Previous.description: Navigation helper inserting a link to the previous page.

params.previousPage: Optional target page or slug for the 'previous' link.
Optional target page for the previous link.
params.overviewPage: Optional overview page slug for context.

PWASidebar.description: Render the Progressive Web App sidebar navigation.

QuickLinksWithSubpages.description: Create quick links that include subpages.

ReadOnlyInline.description: Inline marker indicating the content is read-only.

RFC.description: Reference an RFC by number with optional section and label.

params.displayText: Optional display text to show instead of the canonical reference.
params.section: Optional section number inside the RFC.

SecureContext_Header.description: Display a banner to mark a feature as only available on secure contexts.

SecureContext_Inline.description: Inline marker indicating that a feature requires a secure context.

SeeCompatTable.description: Display a banner to indicate that feature is experimental.

Specifications.description: Reference a specification or standards document.

SubpagesWithSummaries.description: List subpages along with short summaries for each.

SVGAttr.description: Reference an SVG attribute and its description.

params.attribute: The SVG attribute name to reference.

SVGElement.description: Reference an SVG element and display optional labels.

params.element: The SVG element name to reference (e.g. 'svg', 'circle').

SVGInfo.description: Display information about the usage context of an SVG feature or element.

WebExtAPIRef.description: Reference a WebExtension API with optional display text and anchor.

params.anchor: Optional anchor inside the referenced documentation.
params.disableFormatting: Optional flag to disable additional formatting (true/false).

WebExtAllCompatTables.description: Include compatibility tables for all WebExtension APIs.

WebExtAllExamples.description: Embed or link to all WebExtension examples.

WebExtExamples.description: Embed WebExtension-specific examples or code samples.

XsltRef.description: Render the XSLT sidebar navigation with selectable XSLT references.
